metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7805 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in libsndfile 1.0.25 allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via the headindex value in the header in an AIFF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7805` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.25-7ubuntu2.1
sndfile-programs - 1.0.25-7ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.25-7ubuntu2.1').
